title: Do we still get the free 400rp for new accounts?
body: My account is level 7 and i hear you get the rp at level 3 so i never got it.

replies.body:
No, that was removed a while back. 
Instead you now receive the one free hextech loot chest and key which, ultimately, is better because you can count the number of skins you can get with 400 rp in one hand, however the loot chest can be any skin, including expensive ones.
Ahhhhh okay thank's for letting me know :)

Just like Wolfess said ^_^! At level 4 you now get a free hextech chest and key instead of the free RP. Here's a [**link**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp) to the page where we announced the change.
